biocontainers.name: frogs
biocontainers.summary: Frogs is a workflow designed to produce an otus count matrix from high depth sequencing amplicon data. this is the official release 3.1.0 of frogs.

biotools.summary: The user-friendly and Galaxy-supported pipeline FROGS analyses large sets of DNA amplicons sequences accurately and rapidly, essential for microbe community studies.

bioschemas.name: FROGS
bioschemas.summary: The user-friendly and Galaxy-supported pipeline FROGS analyses large sets of DNA amplicons sequences accurately and rapidly, essential for microbe community studies.
